successes.title: ManCan - Put a Brewery of Beer In Your Fridge, Not a Growler
successes.description: The ManCan 128: a one-gallon, personal keg system that keeps your favorite beer fresh, carbonated, and delicious--the way it should be!

Pledges.description:
Fathers Day announcement:
If you are purchasing any of our other items as a father's day gift we would love to send that special Man an email card explaining your great taste in Manly gifts, let him know which ManCan you gave him, and that it will be on its way!

ManCan Patch
Celebrate the ManCan Tribe by sewing this 3" patch on your hat, coat, shirt sleeve, backpack, snowboard bag, etc. 
Thanks for your support.

ManCan Trucker Hat
Treat that big brain of yours with this official (and comfy) ManCan Trucker Hat.  
Thanks for your support.

ManCan T-shirt
Men's or Women's; Black or Gray

This t-shirt will make you look younger, thinner, stronger and happier--guaranteed! Please specify gender, color, and size. 
Thanks for your support.

ManCan Beanie
Stay warm with this oh-so-comfy skull topper.
Thanks for your support.

Early Bird Reward: ManCan 64
There are only 300 available at this amount.
The original ManCan 64 holds 64oz of your favorite beverage, fits in the door of your fridge, and goes anywhere. Guaranteed not to leak.  
Want your logo on it? Go down to the 10-pack and order that. Great for gifts.

Refill Pack
Every ManCan with a tap comes with (2) 16 gram CO2 cartridges, but you'll want more to enjoy all your favorite brews!
This kit includes (10) 16 gram CO2 cartridges and a tub of 25 cleaning tablets.

The Original ManCan 64
Holds 64oz of your favorite beverage, fits in the door of your fridge, and goes anywhere. Guaranteed not to leak.  
Want your logo on it? Go down to the 10-pack and order that. Great for gifts.

Limited Edition: Pink Boots Society's WoManCan 64
We've partnered with our friends at the Pink Boots Society to bring you this Limited Edition WoManCan which holds 64oz of your favorite beverage, fits in the door of your fridge, and goes anywhere. Guaranteed not to leak.

Early Bird Reward: The Original ManCan 64 with tap system
This is the lowest cost you will ever see for it and there are only 300 available at this amount!
It holds 64oz. of your favorite beverage, fits in the door of your fridge, and goes anywhere. Guaranteed not to leak.  
Want your logo on it? Go down to the 10-pack and order that. Great for gifts.
Comes with (2) CO2 cartridges. Might want to grab a refill kit, so you have plenty!

Early Bird Reward: ManCan 128 w/ the Tap system
The ManCan 128 is the reason we are here on Kickstarter. This is the lowest cost you will ever see for our 128oz ManCan and there are only 300 available at this amount!
It's the sexiest thing you will ever see in the door of your fridge.

If you want your logo on this, go down to the 10-pack and order that. Great for gifts.
Comes with (2) CO2 cartridges. Might want to grab a refill kit so you have plenty!

The Original ManCan 64 with a tap system
Holds 64 oz of your favorite beverage, fits in the door of your fridge, and goes anywhere. Guaranteed not to leak.

Want your logo on it? Go down to the 10-pack and order that. Great for gifts.
Comes with (2) CO2 cartridges. You might want to grab a refill kit so you have plenty!
The ManCan 128 w/ the Tap system is the reason we are here on Kickstarter.

It's the sexiest thing you will ever see in the door of your fridge.
Want your logo on it? Go down to the 10-pack and order that. Great for gifts.
Comes with (2) CO2 cartridges. You might want to grab a refill kit, so you have plenty!

Limited Edition: Pink Boots Society's WoManCan 128 with tap system
We've partnered with our friends at the Pink Boots Society to bring you this Limited Edition WoManCan which holds 128oz of your favorite beverage, fits in the door of your fridge, and goes anywhere. Guaranteed not to leak.
Comes with (2) CO2 cartridges. You might want to grab a refill kit, so you have plenty!

The WoManCan 128 with tap system
OK, OK we heard you! We'll make you a WooooooMan can, ladies (but not for long)! There are only 300. You're right, you are tougher and more fun than some of our wimpy guy friends. But don't tell them that.  
Remember the ManCan IS the sexiest thing you will EVER see in your fridge or anywhere you bring it.

The GroomsManCan - aka "The Hangover"
(6) ManCan 64s for you and your friends with your custom logo or message.  No one will ever forget these gifts! 
*If your wedding is before September 15, 2015, please contact us with your invitation and we will get your GroomsManCans ASAP (but we expect an open bar)!
The ManCan Machismo 128 w/ the Perlick Perl Tap system

"The Most Interesting ManCan in the World"
Live vicariously through yourself with this ManCan 128 and Limited Edition Perlick Perl tap system. Only 100 available!
Comes with (2) CO2 cartridges. Might want to grab a refill kit so you have plenty!
The ManCan Machismo 128 w/ the Perlick Perl Tap system

"The Most Interesting ManCan in the World"
Live vicariously through yourself with this ManCan 128 and Limited Edition Perlick Perl tap system. Only 100 available!
Comes with (2) CO2 cartridges. Might want to grab a refill kit so you have plenty!
The ManCan Machismo 128 w/ the Perlick Perl Tap system

"The Most Interesting ManCan in the World" 
Live vicariously through yourself with this ManCan 128 and Limited Edition Perlick Perl tap system. Only 100 available! 
Comes with (2) CO2 cartridges. Might want to grab a refill kit so you have plenty!
